column5: I took a drive out to belwood this morning and fished from 8 til noon. Around 11 the set line went off and yielded a pike of monumental proportions then I put the binoculars down and saw it was 18".  Close to noon the wind picked right up and made it a trial so packed up and headed to a bar.  Ice there was 6-8" and solid. Conservation area had plenty of minnows etc.
thanks for the update, im planing to go there sometime
